contentrichtext.text: {{Contains Chinese text}} {{Infobox person | name = Quek Leng Chan<br />{{linktext|郭|令|燦}} | image = | ethnicity = [[Han Chinese]] | imagesize = | caption = | birth_date = 1941 | occupation = Shareholder of [[Hong Leong Enterprises Pte Ltd]]<br/>Chairman Of [[Hong Leong Group]] | Industry = Finance | networth = {{gain}}[[United States Dollar|US$]]2.9 billion (2007)<ref name="forbes">[http://www.forbes.com/lists/2007/10/07billionaires_Quek-Leng-Chan_S1DG.html #314 Quek Leng Chan - Forbes.com<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> | children = 3 children }} '''[[Malay titles#Tan Sri|YBhg Tan Sri]] Quek Leng Chan''' ({{zh|s={{linktext|郭|令|灿}}|t={{linktext|郭|令|燦}}|p=Guō Lìngcàn}}; born 1941, [[Singapore]]) is a [[Malaysia]]n [[tycoon]] who co-founded [[Hong Leong Group|Hong Leong Group Malaysia]]. He is one of the richest men in Malaysia with an estimated net worth of [[United States Dollar|US$]]2.9 billion according to [[Forbes]]<ref name="forbes"/> in 2007. YBhg Tan Sri Quek Leng Chan studied in [[Victoria School]] in [[Singapore]] and is qualified as a [[Barrister|Barrister-at-Law]] from Middle Temple, United Kingdom. He has extensive business experience in various sectors, including [[financial services]], [[manufacturing]] and [[real estate]]. He is the Chairman & Chief Executive Officer of Hong Leong Company (Malaysia) Berhad (“HLCM”), Executive Chairman of Hong Leong Industries Berhad (“HLI”), Hume Industries (Malaysia) Berhad (“HIMB”), Hong Leong Financial Group Berhad, GuocoLand (Malaysia) Berhad, Camerlin Group Berhad and Chairman of Hong Leong Bank Berhad, HLG Capital Berhad (“HLG”), Hong Leong Assurance Berhad, Hong Leong Islamic Bank Berhad and Hong Leong Foundation (“HLF”). Quek oversees the Malaysian operations of the Hong Leong Group while his cousin and fellow billionaire [[Kwek Leng Beng]] oversees the Singapore operations. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://us.ft.com/ftgateway/superpage.ft?news_id=fto071420050067005466 Guoco raid on BIL shares triggers takeover] * [http://us.ft.com/ftgateway/superpage.ft?news_id=fto071420050023005422 HK's Guoco Group offers US$584m for BIL] * [http://www.reuters.com/finance/stocks/officerProfile?symbol=NRRA.KL&officerId=1056298 Narra Industries Bhd (Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange)] * [http://www.hoovers.com/guocoleisure/--ID__121178,PID__996861,target__company_executive--/free-co-samples-index.xhtml Hoovers] * [http://www.stpns.net/view_article.html?articleId=10544351054351414 Chairman Quek Leng Chan Makes Low-Profile Visit to Molokai Ranch] * [http://www.insideralpha.com/reports/filingAnalysis.php?stockCode=B16 Insider: Quek Leng Chan] * [http://www.reddotcreation.com/public_html/forums/printthread.php?t=7009 Room At The Top - Kwek Leng Beng] * [http://findarticles.com/p/articles/mi_qn6207/is_20020916/ai_n24905498 The Other Kwek] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Quek Leng Chan | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Malaysian businessman | DATE OF BIRTH = 1941 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Quek Leng Chan}} [[Category:1941 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Singaporean people]] [[Category:Malaysian billionaires]] [[Category:Malaysian businesspeople]] [[Category:Malaysian Chinese people]] [[Category:Victoria School, Singapore alumni]] {{Malaysia-business-bio-stub}}
